title: Lily-Rose Depp is accompanied by a burly security guard as she picks up groceries
text:
She's the daughter of A-listers Johnny Depp and Vanessa Paradis and has just starred in her biggest role yet for historical drama The King.

But Lily-Rose Depp took a break from her usually glamorous lifestyle to pick up her groceries at her local store in Los Angeles on Tuesday.

The model and actress, 20, was accompanied by a doting security guard who carried her bag of shopping during the low-key outing.

Crossing off that to-do list: Lily-Rose Depp took a break from her usually glamorous lifestyle to pick up her groceries at her local store in Los Angeles on Tuesday

The star looked sophisticated in a long-sleeved jumper, jeans and a pair of black kitten heels.

The model accessorised her look with a small over the shoulder bag and some simple gold jewellery.

The blonde wore her shoulder-length tresses down and appeared to have added a touch of light make-up to her clear complexion.

Lily-Rose was later spotted picking up food to go at Pinches Tacos Mexican restaurant in West Hollywood.

Off-duty beauty: The model and actress, 20, looked sophisticated in a long-sleeved jumper, jeans and a pair of black kitten heels

By then, the actress had tied her hair into a bun and was carrying the white carrier bag of food for herself.

The American-French beauty previously opened up about her struggles with an eating disorder in her younger years.

Speaking to Elle France in late 2016, she said she was affected by critical comments on social media about her looks.

'It hurts a lot and depresses me, because I have spent a lot of energy fighting the disease,' she explained.

A bite to eat: Lily-Rose was later spotted picking up food to go at Pinches Tacos Mexican restaurant in West Hollywood

'I was much younger, when I faced with anorexia, it was very difficult to deal with it. All who are familiar with this problem, know how difficult it is to return to a normal life.'

Sje added: 'I have battled eating disorder for a long time, and am very proud of the results that I have achieved.'

Lily-Rose is the daughter of actor Johnny Depp, 56, and French singer and model, Vanessa Paradis, 46.

The pair never married but were together between 1998 and 2012. They are also parents to John Christopher Depp III, 17.

Lily-Rose has been dating up and coming actor Timothée Chalamet, 23, since meeting on the set of The King in 2018.
description: The model and actress, 20, took a break from her usually glamorous lifestyle to pick up her groceries at her local store in Los Angeles on Tuesday.
